name: ZENDAY
description:
A quiet basic little art game where you're only goal is to water plants, take them to the kitchen to vanish, go to bed, then repeat, enjoying the music and world.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Click to interact.

Known issues:

  • Audio Slider doesn't work.

Made by me and James Smythe for the 2016 ART//GAMES//HACKATHON at Gamecity Nottingham, check it out as that place is pretty neat.
